description: Mentioned only in a list of mixture stops in Irwin under the heading �accompanimental�, with no definition. We can infer from the name that it is a Mixture stop composed of Dolce ranks.
examplesDescription: Dolce Mixture III 2-2/3, Swell; Saint Cecilia Church, Hastings, Nebraska, USA; Quimby Pipe Organs 1996.
